TopicTitle: any mod that does this - vacuum effect?

Articles.Content: Curious is there is mod out there that changes the engine flame/exhaust as the atmosphere thins. I was thinking hot rockets did something like that but there seems to be quite a few problems with that mod here recently. Here is the effect I am talking about.
And yes it's hot rockets you just have to set it up if you want a big flame and there is expanding plum settings to have both you have to meet in the middle.

And yes it's hot rockets you just have to set it up if you want a big flame and there is expanding plum settings to have both you have to meet in the middle.

Awesome. Thanks for the info. I used hot rockets when it first came out but haven't since the last kernel update. Is the hot rockets configuration easy? Where do you find these settings?
